#summary This page tries to hold the corrections and improvements occurred in the database.

== Introduction ==

When registering any changelog here, please keep in mind the following suggestions:

  * Each registered change should have the date in which it was done (please follow this format: YYYY-MM-DD).
  * Each changelog should have a brief explanation of the change/improvement made.
  * Please use bullets for each changelog.
  * Last changelog added must be in the first line.
